name: Z Zone Zombie - III
description:
Enter the Z Zone and defeat Zombies summoned by the Uncle John of 'Dark Side' family to torment the 'Evercool' village folks in this modern 2D platformer.

Defeat hordes of Zombies.

Fight awesome Boss Battles.

Collect lots and lots of Coins, Stars, Life, and Power-Ups.

Explore secret hidden Treasure Rooms.

Experience loads of thrilling Sound and Visual effects.

And

Enjoy a rich complete 2D Platformer Gameplay Experience.
